titleStmt.title: An address given in to the late King James, by the titular Archbishop of Dublin from the General meeting of the Romish bishops and clergy of Ireland, held in May last, by that Kings order : wherein several things relating to the popish designs upon these three kingdoms are discovered : the original whereof was found in the late King James closet, in the Castle of Dublin, at his leaving that city and the copy whereof was found in the titular Archbishop's : lodgings : now published with reflection on each paragraph.
titleStmt.author: Russell, Patrick, 1629-1692.

notesStmt.note: Item at reel 2215:11 identified as Wing R2346A (number cancelled).
Reproduction of original in Bodleian Library and Harvard University Library.
